mapper.select: SELECT order_id, funding_id, qty, amount, use_point, discount_amount, status, funding_status, purchased_at, refund_at FROM ORDER WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER ( user_id, funding_id, qty, amount, use_point, discount_amount, status, funding_status, purchased_at, refund_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{fundingId}, #{qty}, #{amount}, #{usePoint}, #{discountAmount}, #{status}, #{fundingStatus}, SYSDATE, null )
